verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> In you, O LORD, <WH3068> do I put my trust; <WH2620> let me never <WH408> <WH3808> be ashamed: <WH954> deliver <WH6403> me in your righteousness. <WH6666>
Bow <WH5186> down <WH5186> your ear <WH241> to me; deliver <WH5337> me speedily: <WH4120> be you my strong <WH4581> rock, <WH6697> for an house <WH1004> of defense <WH4686> to save <WH3467> me.
For you are my rock <WH5553> and my fortress; <WH4686> therefore for your name's <WH8034> sake <WH4616> lead <WH5148> me, and guide <WH5095> me.
Pull <WH3318> me out of the net <WH7568> that they have laid <WH2934> privately <WH2934> for me: for you are my strength. <WH4581>
Into your hand <WH3027> I commit <WH6485> my spirit: <WH7307> you have redeemed <WH6299> me, O LORD <WH3068> God <WH410> of truth. <WH571>
I have hated <WH8130> them that regard <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities: <WH1892> but I trust <WH982> in the LORD. <WH3068>
I will be glad <WH1523> and rejoice <WH8055> in your mercy: <WH2617> for you have considered <WH7200> my trouble; <WH6040> you have known <WH3045> my soul <WH5315> in adversities; <WH6869>
And have not shut <WH5462> me up into the hand <WH3027> of the enemy: <WH341> you have set <WH5975> my feet <WH7272> in a large <WH4800> room. <WH4800>
Have mercy <WH2603> on me, O LORD, <WH3068> for I am in trouble: <WH6887> my eye <WH5869> is consumed <WH6244> with grief, <WH3708> yes, my soul <WH5315> and my belly. <WH990>

For my life <WH2416> is spent <WH3615> with grief, <WH3015> and my years <WH8141> with sighing: <WH585> my strength <WH3581> fails <WH3782> because of my iniquity, <WH5771> and my bones <WH6106> are consumed. <WH6244>

I was a reproach <WH2781> among all <WH3605> my enemies, <WH6887> but especially <WH3966> among my neighbors, <WH7934> and a fear <WH6343> to my acquaintance: <WH3045> they that did see <WH7200> me without <WH2351> fled <WH5074> from me.
I am forgotten <WH7911> as a dead <WH4191> man out of mind: <WH3820> I am like a broken <WH6> vessel. <WH3627>

For I have heard <WH8085> the slander <WH1681> of many: <WH7227> fear <WH4032> was on every <WH5437> side: <WH5439> while they took counsel <WH3245> together <WH3162> against <WH5921> me, they devised <WH2161> to take <WH3947> away my life. <WH5315>
But I trusted <WH982> in you, O LORD: <WH3068> I said, <WH559> You are my God. <WH430>
My times <WH6256> are in your hand: <WH3027> deliver <WH5337> me from the hand <WH3027> of my enemies, <WH341> and from them that persecute <WH7291> me.
Make your face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> on your servant: <WH5650> save <WH3467> me for your mercies' <WH2617> sake.
Let me not be ashamed, <WH954> O LORD; <WH3068> for I have called <WH7121> on you: let the wicked <WH7563> be ashamed, <WH954> and let them be silent <WH1826> in the grave. <WH7585>
Let the lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193> be put to silence; <WH481> which speak <WH1696> grievous <WH6277> things proudly <WH1346> and contemptuously <WH937> against <WH5921> the righteous. <WH6662>

Oh how <WH4100> great <WH7227> is your goodness, <WH2898> which <WH834> you have laid <WH6845> up for them that fear <WH3373> you; which you have worked <WH6466> for them that trust <WH2620> in you before <WH5048> the sons <WH1121> of men! <WH120>

You shall hide <WH5641> them in the secret <WH5643> of your presence <WH6440> from the pride <WH7407> of man: <WH376> you shall keep them secretly <WH6845> in a pavilion <WH5521> from the strife <WH7379> of tongues. <WH3956>
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD: <WH3068> for he has showed me his marvelous <WH6381> kindness <WH2617> in a strong <WH4692> city. <WH5892>

For I said <WH559> in my haste, <WH2648> I am cut <WH1629> off from before <WH5048> your eyes: <WH5869> nevertheless <WH403> you heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469> when I cried <WH7768> to you.

O love <WH157> the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> you his saints: <WH2623> for the LORD <WH3068> preserves <WH5341> the faithful, <WH539> and plentifully <WH3499> rewards <WH7999> the proud <WH1346> doer. <WH6213>
Be of good courage, <WH2388> and he shall strengthen <WH553> your heart, <WH3824> all <WH3605> you that hope <WH3176> in the LORD. <WH3068>
